Masterstation

Class MasterGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Masterstation.MasterGUI

  • public class MasterGUI
extends javafx.application.Application
    Master GUI class is a display of the main GUI seen by the user of the program. The user can view the connection status, add multiple stations, view plots with live data, save the data and plots.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Eliza Gazda

    • Nested Class Summary

        public void btStationActions(java.lang.String stationName)
        Parameters:
        stationName - : the name of each station set up by the user This method allows each station button to open graph settings and setup the station plots

      • addPlotsToGUI

        public void addPlotsToGUI(java.lang.String stationName,
                          javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<java.lang.String>[] cbPlotXAxis,
                          javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<java.lang.String>[] cbPlotYAxis)
        Parameters:
        stationName - : name of station chosen by the user
        cbPlotXAxis - : choice box option for x axis in plots
        cbPlotYAxis - : choice box option for x axis in plots This method adds all plots for a specific station to the main GUI
